template_data.name: Al-Suqut Mountains

document_data.caption: A map showing Al-Suqut Mountains in west Zakhara.
document_data.name: Al-Suqut Mountains
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Suqut Mountains''', or the '''Tumbling Mountains''', were found in [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: Al-Suqut Mountains separated the western "border" of the [[Pearl Cities]] from the [[Great Sea]]. They were situated just south of the [[High Desert]].
document_data.Description: The mountains were strung along the western coast of the southern portion of west Zakhara, sitting in a roughly linear north to south position.
document_data.Inhabitants: Al-Suqut Mountains were believed to harbor mad [[wizard]]s, unenlightened tribes, and sea-faring brigands.
